script: In this update, Desmond made two key changes to the event landing page. First, the location was updated from San Francisco, California to Singapore, NUS to reflect the new venue. Second, the call-to-action button text was modified to add urgency, changing from 'Get Your Tickets' to 'Get Your Tickets NOWWWW' to encourage immediate registration.

changes.title: Updated Event Location
changes.description: Changed location from San Francisco to Singapore, NUS

changes.title: Modified CTA Button Text
changes.description: Added urgency with NOWWWW to ticket button
